00015 /*                                                                            */

00020 /******************************************************************************/
00021 
00022 #ifndef VMI_PARAMETERS_H
00023 #define VMI_PARAMETERS_H
00024 
00025 #include "vmi/vmiTyperefs.h"
00026 #include "hostapi/impTypes.h"
00027 
00028 //
00029 // Model parameter types
00030 //
00031 typedef enum vmiParameterTypeE {
00032     vmi_PT_BOOL,     // Boolean parameter. Can be 0,n,N,f,F,dis etc. or 1,y,Y,t,T,en
00033     vmi_PT_INT32,    // Signed integer parameter.
00034     vmi_PT_UNS32,    // Unsigned integer parameter.
00035     vmi_PT_UNS64,    // Unsigned long integer parameter.
00036     vmi_PT_DOUBLE,   // Floating point parameter.
00037     vmi_PT_STRING,   // String parameter.
00038     vmi_PT_ENUM,     // Enum parameter.
00039                      // Specified by a string from a set of strings.
00040                      // Returns an integer.
00041     vmi_PT_ENDIAN,   // Takes one of two values; little or big
00042     vmi_PT_PTR,      // Pointer parameter.
00043 } vmiParameterType;
00044 
00045 //
00046 // Enumeration name/value pairs
00047 //
00048 typedef struct vmiEnumParameterS {
00049     const char *name;
00050     Uns32       value;
00051     const char *description;
00052     void       *descriptionDom;
00053 } vmiEnumParameter;
00054 
00055 //
00056 // Specification of a model parameter
00057 //
00058 typedef struct vmiParameterS {
00059     const char      *name;
00060     vmiParameterType type;
00061 
00062     // for safety, record the size
00063     Uns8             sizeOf;
00064 
00065     // byte offset into the model's parameter table
00066     Uns32            valueOffset;
00067 
00068     // byte offset into the model's 'parameter is set' table
00069     Uns32            setBitOffset;
00070 
00071     // space for documentation
00072     const char      *description;
00073     void            *descriptionDom;
00074 
00075     // specs of each parameter type
00076     union {
00077 
00078         struct boolParamS {
00079             Bool defaultValue;
00080         } boolParam;
00081 
00082         struct int32ParamS {
00083             Int32 defaultValue;
00084             Int32 min;
00085             Int32 max;
00086         } int32Param;
00087 
00088         struct uns32ParamS {
00089             Uns32 defaultValue;
00090             Uns32 min;
00091             Uns32 max;
00092         } uns32Param;
00093 
00094         struct uns64ParamS {
00095             Uns64 defaultValue;
00096             Uns64 min;
00097             Uns64 max;
00098         } uns64Param;
00099 
00100         struct ptrParamS {
00101             void *defaultValue;
00102         } ptrParam;
00103 
00104         struct doubleParamS {
00105             double defaultValue;
00106             double min;
00107             double max;
00108         } doubleParam;
00109 
00110         struct stringParamS {
00111             const char *defaultValue;
00112         } stringParam;
00113 
00114         struct enumParamS {
00115             vmiEnumParameterP legalValues; // null terminated, first is the default,
00116         } enumParam;
00117     } u;
00118 } vmiParameter;
00119 
00120 //
00121 // Offset of parameter data in instance structure.
00122 // Used in this file (not by users).
00123 //
00124 #define VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STRUCT, _MEMBER) \
00125     ((UnsPS)(&(((_STRUCT ## P)0)->_MEMBER)))
00126 
00127 #define SETBIT(_MEMBER)  _MEMBER ## __ ## set
00128 
00129 //
00130 // macros to initialize parameter spec entries
00131 //
00132 
00133 #define VMI_BOOL_PARAM_SPEC(_STR,_NAME,_DEFAULT,_DESC) { \
00134     .name                     =  #_NAME, \
00135     .type                     = vmi_PT_BOOL, \
00136     .valueOffset              = VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR, _NAME), \
00137     .setBitOffset             = VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR, SETBIT(_NAME)), \
00138     .u.boolParam.defaultValue = _DEFAULT, \
00139     .description              = _DESC, \
00140     .sizeOf                   = sizeof(Bool) \
00141 }
00142 
00143 #define VMI_INT32_PARAM_SPEC(_STR,_NAME,_DEFAULT,_MIN,_MAX,_DESC)  { \
00144     .name                      = #_NAME, \
00145     .type                      = vmi_PT_INT32, \
00146     .u.int32Param.defaultValue = _DEFAULT, \
00147     .valueOffset               = VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR,_NAME), \
00148     .setBitOffset              = VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR, SETBIT(_NAME)), \
00149     .u.int32Param.min          = _MIN, \
00150     .u.int32Param.max          = _MAX, \
00151     .description               = _DESC, \
00152     .sizeOf                    = sizeof(Int32) \
00153 }
00154 
00155 #define VMI_UNS32_PARAM_SPEC(_STR,_NAME,_DEFAULT,_MIN,_MAX,_DESC)  { \
00156     .name                      = #_NAME, \
00157     .type                      = vmi_PT_UNS32, \
00158     .u.uns32Param.defaultValue = _DEFAULT, \
00159     .valueOffset               = VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR,_NAME), \
00160     .setBitOffset              = VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR, SETBIT(_NAME)), \
00161     .u.uns32Param.min          = _MIN, \
00162     .u.uns32Param.max          = _MAX, \
00163     .description               = _DESC, \
00164     .sizeOf                    = sizeof(Uns32) \
00165 }
00166 
00167 #define VMI_UNS64_PARAM_SPEC(_STR,_NAME,_DEFAULT,_MIN,_MAX,_DESC)  { \
00168     .name                      =  #_NAME, \
00169     .type                      = vmi_PT_UNS64, \
00170     .u.uns64Param.defaultValue = _DEFAULT, \
00171     .valueOffset               =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR,_NAME), \
00172     .setBitOffset              =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR, SETBIT(_NAME)), \
00173     .u.uns64Param.min          = _MIN, \
00174     .u.uns64Param.max          = _MAX, \
00175     .description               = _DESC, \
00176     .sizeOf                    = sizeof(Uns64) \
00177 }
00178 
00179 #define VMI_PTR_PARAM_SPEC(_STR,_NAME,_DEFAULT,_DESC)  { \
00180     .name                      =  #_NAME, \
00181     .type                      =  vmi_PT_PTR, \
00182     .u.ptrParam.defaultValue   = _DEFAULT, \
00183     .valueOffset               =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR,_NAME), \
00184     .setBitOffset              =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR, SETBIT(_NAME)), \
00185     .description               = _DESC, \
00186     .sizeOf                    = sizeof(void*) \
00187 }
00188 
00189 #define VMI_DBL_PARAM_SPEC(_STR,_NAME,_DEFAULT,_MIN,_MAX,_DESC)  { \
00190     .name                       =  #_NAME, \
00191     .type                       = vmi_PT_DOUBLE, \
00192     .u.doubleParam.defaultValue = _DEFAULT, \
00193     .valueOffset                =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR,_NAME), \
00194     .setBitOffset               =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR, SETBIT(_NAME)), \
00195     .u.doubleParam.min          = _MIN, \
00196     .u.doubleParam.max          = _MAX, \
00197     .description                = _DESC,  \
00198     .sizeOf                     = sizeof(double) \
00199 }
00200 
00201 #define VMI_ENUM_PARAM_SPEC(_STR,_NAME,_list,_DESC) { \
00202     .name                    =  #_NAME, \
00203     .type                    = vmi_PT_ENUM, \
00204     .u.enumParam.legalValues = _list, \
00205     .valueOffset             =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR,_NAME), \
00206     .setBitOffset            =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR, SETBIT(_NAME)), \
00207     .description             = _DESC,  \
00208     .sizeOf                  = sizeof(Uns32) \
00209 }
00210 
00211 //
00212 // Standard macro for endian selection
00213 //
00214 #define VMI_ENDIAN_PARAM_SPEC(_STR,_NAME, _DESC) { \
00215     .name                    = # _NAME, \
00216     .type                    = vmi_PT_ENDIAN, \
00217     .valueOffset             =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR,_NAME), \
00218     .setBitOffset            =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR, SETBIT(_NAME)), \
00219     .description             = _DESC, \
00220     .sizeOf                  = sizeof(Uns32) \
00221 }
00222 
00223 #define VMI_STRING_PARAM_SPEC(_STR,_NAME,_DEFAULT,_DESC)  { \
00224     .name                       =  #_NAME, \
00225     .type                       = vmi_PT_STRING, \
00226     .u.stringParam.defaultValue = _DEFAULT, \
00227     .valueOffset                =  VMI_PARAM_OFFSET(_STR,_NAME), \
00228     .description                = _DESC,  \
00229     .sizeOf                     = sizeof(char*) \
00230 }
00231 
00232 //
00233 // Use this to terminate the list
00234 //
00235 #define VMI_END_PARAM  { .name= 0 }
00236 
00237 //
00238 // Declare an attribute value ...       here   .. and the flag here
00239 #define VMI_BOOL_PARAM(_NAME)    Bool   _NAME;   Bool SETBIT(_NAME);
00240 #define VMI_INT32_PARAM(_NAME)   Int32  _NAME;   Bool SETBIT(_NAME);
00241 #define VMI_UNS32_PARAM(_NAME)   Uns32  _NAME;   Bool SETBIT(_NAME);
00242 #define VMI_UNS64_PARAM(_NAME)   Uns64  _NAME;   Bool SETBIT(_NAME);
00243 #define VMI_PTR_PARAM(_NAME)     void * _NAME;   Bool SETBIT(_NAME);
00244 #define VMI_DBL_PARAM(_NAME)     double _NAME;   Bool SETBIT(_NAME);
00245 #define VMI_ENUM_PARAM(_NAME)    Uns32  _NAME;   Bool SETBIT(_NAME);
00246 #define VMI_ENDIAN_PARAM(_NAME)  Uns32  _NAME;   Bool SETBIT(_NAME);
00247 #define VMI_STRING_PARAM(_NAME)  char * _NAME;
00248 
00249 //
00250 // Min/Max values
00251 //
00252 #define VMI_MAXS32 (0x7FFFFFFF)
00253 #define VMI_MINS32 (-VMI_MAXS32-1)
00254 #define VMI_MAXU32 (-1)
00255 #define VMI_MAXU64 (-1LL)
00256 
00257 #endif
